channel.title: The Outsider - Albert Camus
channel.description:
Anyone read this book? It's translated from french and was written some time in the 1940s. I thought it was pretty good, it's quite short too.
I guess I wont waste a long time talking about this book because I doubt anyone will ever read this thread as nobody seems to read anymore. I thought it was really quite a touching story.

item.title: The Outsider - Albert Camus

item.description:
@Ford_2_Race wrote:

Well, that’s quite convenient then.

item.title: The Outsider - Albert Camus
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Ford 2 Race, post:3, topic:267407”][quote author=Davidude link=topic=353053.msg2706654#msg2706654 date=1237038199]
Anyone read this book? It’s translated from french and was written some time in the 1940s. I thought it was pretty good, it’s quite short too.

I guess I wont waste a long time talking about this book because I doubt anyone will ever read this thread as nobody seems to read anymore. I thought it was really quite a touching story.
[/quote]

Being quite short, how many pages approx? Because, I doubt that I will finish the book if it’s over 250.[/quote]
117 pages, and the font is quite large too.
